articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus on the occasion of the 79th anniversary of the founding of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 He warmly congratulated the performers and audience on the 79th birthday of the KPA.
					
					 Its repertoire included such colorful numbers as male chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", female solo and male chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?," male solos and male choruses "For My Only Motherland" and "We Will Defend the Leadership of the Revolution at the Cost of Our Lives".
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the glorious history of the heroic KPA in which it has covered the path of victory and glory under the uplifted red flag of the revolution and fully demonstrated the iron faith and indomitable will of the army and the people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in the forest of Mt. Paektu and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the splendid performance given by the State Merited Chorus. He highly appreciated its success made in the performance and extended thanks to all its creators and artistes. 
					
					 The nearly 80 years-long history of the KPA is shining as a glorious one in which it created a precious tradition in the van of Songun revolution and has firmly preserved it, he noted, expressing great expectation and belief that the KPA would creditably fulfill its honorable mission as a standard-bearer and a shock brigade in putting into practice the party's determination and will to translate the desire of President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime into reality and provide the people with the most civilized and happy life by building a thriving socialist nation on this land without fail. 
					
					 Among the audience were senior officials of the party and the army Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, U Tong Chuk and Ju Kyu Chang, members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Choe Pu Il, Kim Yong Chol and Yun Jong Rin,  Minister of People's Security Ri Myong Su, Department Director of the NDC Hyon Chol Hae and servicepersons.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tanzanian President
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, Tanzanian President, on the occasion of the 47th founding anniversary of the United Republic of Tanzania.
					The message wished the President and people of Tanzania successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Tanzania would grow stronger at a higher stage in the days ahead.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations Leave for China
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations Leave for China
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Choe Han Chun on Monday left here for China to attend the international trade unions' forum.
					 A delegation of the International Affairs Institute led by Vice Director Kim Ul Ho left here on the same day.

articles.title: Mongolian Party Delegation Wraps up Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Mongolian Party Delegation Wraps up Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolian People's Party led by General Secretary U. Khurelsukh flew back on Monday. 
					 During its stay the delegation visited the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 It also visited the e-library and swimming pool of Kim Il Sung University, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Grand People's Study House, the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower, etc.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 79th birthday of the KPA. 
					 Servicepersons of the KPA, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in Pyongyang visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Seen standing before the statue was a floral basket sent by        Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Laid before the statue were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, factories and enterprises and schools and flowers. 
					
					 The visitors paid homage to the President in humble reverence. 
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before his statues in different parts of Pyongyang. 
					
					 The servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country visited the statues of the President in their residential areas to place floral baskets and flowers and pay tribute to him.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries and Memorial Tower
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid at Martyrs Cemeteries and Memorial Tower
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Monday on the occasion of the 79th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Seen at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Present at the wreath and floral basket laying ceremonies were senior officials of the party, army and state, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 They placed bouquets and flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong. 
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries. And a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the WPK Central Military Commission was laid before the main theme sculpture "Victory" of the memorial tower. 
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths and floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, cultural and arts, public health and media organs, and party and power bodies, industrial establishments, farms and schools here. 
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs and paid tribute to the servicepersons of the KPA who performed feats in the war.
					
					 The military attaches corps here laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and a floral basket before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on the same day.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 A wreath and a floral basket in the name of the corps were laid on the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery and before the main theme sculpture of the memorial tower. 
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the statues of martyrs, monuments to fallen fighters of the KPA, martyrs' cemeteries and graves of martyrs in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units 
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the three services of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of the 79th birthday of the KPA. 
					Meetings for conveying gifts sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il took place at units of the KPA.
					
					 Members of the delegations conveyed to servicepersons news of the rear where a great surge is being effected in the efforts to improve the standard of people's living and handed the aid materials prepared by people with sincerity. They congratulated the servicepersons on the army day. 
					
					 Servicepersons showed the road covered by their units with pride and their training, fully armed with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the country. 
					
					 Members of the delegations looked round educational rooms, bedrooms, mess halls, non-staple food stores, soldiers' halls and other places. 
					
					 Then they had sports and amusement games and art performances together with servicepersons. 
					
					 They heard stories from the soldiers who set examples in combat and political trainings and conveyed to them the wishes of the people to see them glorifying their military service with exploits as befitting soldiers of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The soldiers reiterated their faith and will to guarantee the building of a thriving nation of Juche with arms, bearing in mind the wishes of the country and people, and deal a merciless blow at the aggressors, should they ignite another war on this land.

articles.title: Performances Given on Army Day
articles.content:
Performances Given on Army Day 
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday to celebrate the 79th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Among the audience were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city. 
					
					 Invited to enjoy the performance were diplomatic envoys of different countries, members of the military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and overseas compatriots visiting the socialist homeland.
					
					 The performance began with the chorus of "Song of Revolutionary Army."
					
					 Its repertoire included mixed duet and chorus of the immortal classic masterpiece "Song of the Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland," female solo "Mt. Paektu Is the Cradle of the Revolution," dance "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight," male trio "My Song in the Trench," female instrumental concert "We Long for You, General" and male solo "Soldiers Live near the General."
					
					The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by accomplishing the historic cause of building Juche-based revolutionary armed forces and providing the ever-victorious tradition and those of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who led the cause of building a thriving socialist nation to victory with his original Songun politics.
					
					 A performance was also given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Youth League at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower on the same day. 
					
					 Its repertoire included female trio "Ongheya of Victory of Songun" and male quartet "His Field Guidance Is the Guerrilla Way."

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country Monday on the army day. 
					 They began to the tune of "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" at the plazas of the April 25 House of Culture, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other venues in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The youth and students presented dances with boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung who set a shining example in building the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces and defeated two imperialisms in one generation, thus exalting the dignity and honor of the country and its people. 
					
					 The enthusiasm of the dancers picked up when bands played "Our General Is the Best", "The General on the Galloping White Horse" and other songs in succession. 
					
					 The dances reflected the boundless reverence of the youth and students for Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il who has led the struggle for defending socialism and the building of a thriving nation to victory under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 Meanwhile, similar dancing parties took place in different parts of the country including Phyongsong and Kanggye cites.

articles.title: Glorious History of KPA
articles.content:
Glorious History of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) greets its 79th anniversary on Monday. 
					 The armed forces, founded by President Kim Il Sung, won the anti-Japanese war and liberated the country, regaining the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and making it possible to build a powerful independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 The KPA defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War and defended the country. It has also guaranteed the Korean people's socialist revolution and construction with arms.
					
					 The KPA, which became regular armed forces with all branches of arms and services under the leadership of the President, creditably safeguarded the nation and socialism, smashing the U.S. imperialists' provocations like the spy ship "Pueblo", spy plane "EC-121" and Panmunjom incidents.
					
					 The army is now fully discharging its mission in defending socialism and building a thriving nation under the command of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to the KPA, the Korean people, though the situation still remains strained, enjoy a peaceful life, building many modern industrial establishments and monuments throughout the country.
					
					 The KPA's is a glorious history shining with heroic feats in the struggle against imperialism and for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Newspapers Editorially Mark KPA's Birthday
articles.content:
Newspapers Editorially Mark KPA's Birthday
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Monday editorially observe the 79th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the KPA is a powerful core force for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 The history of the KPA means the history of the Korean revolution and the invincible strength of the People's Army guarantees the tremendous national power of Kim Il Sung's Korea and its rosy future, it adds.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly brilliant commander who gave origin to Songun and paved the way for building the Juche-based revolutionary armed forces, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The KPA is the proud revolutionary armed forces which have steadily carried forward the glorious history and tradition of the main forces for the revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA's history is a sacred course in which it set shining examples in devotedly safeguarding the leader in every grim period of the revolution, a shining history in which it won victories and wrought miracles in the showdown with the United States and other imperialists and the building of a thriving nation by displaying the indomitable revolutionary spirit and popular heroism and a course in which it dynamically led the revolutionary ranks as a vanguard unit and main force for the revolution.
					
					 The KPA has demonstrated its might as a single-mindedly united core force of the entire party and army and all the people rallied close around Kim Jong Il, a powerful vanguard which translates the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a thriving nation into a shining reality and a reliable defender of the socialist country of Juche.
					
					 The KPA will always demonstrate its dignity as vanguard and main force in the struggle for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and building a thriving socialist nation and successfully perform its historic mission before the country and nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that it is thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il that the KPA has demonstrated its might as a main force of the revolution of Juche in defending socialism and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: KPA Praised by Foreigners and Foreign Media
articles.content:
KPA Praised by Foreigners and Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and foreign media praised the ideological and moral traits and fighting spirit of the soldiers of the Korean People's Army.
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the army of the DPRK is not only defending the country but making a breakthrough in socialist economic construction and all the people are learning from the noble ideological and moral world displayed by the servicepersons.
					
					The chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia said that the servicepersons, who built the Anbyon Youth Power Station, gave full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit during the construction of the power station, greatly encouraging the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University of Guinea noted that the revolutionary soldier spirit created by the KPA servicepersons prevailed throughout the society, remarkably increasing the political forces of socialist Korea.
					
					 The Iranian paper Iran News said that the KPA soldiers are working new miracles and innovations everywhere under the slogan "Let Us Undertake Both National Defence and Socialist Construction!"
					
					 The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia said in its bulletin that the KPA is playing the role of a soldier on an outpost duty bringing about a leap forward and making a breakthrough toward advance in economic construction, too.

articles.title: KCTU's May Action Plan Confirmed
articles.content:
KCTU's May Action Plan Confirmed 
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions at the meeting of its Central Executive Committee on April 21 confirmed its May action plan.
					 It said that the organization would hold rallies in Seoul and 14 other areas simultaneously on the occasion of May Day to realize wage hike and a total re-amendment to the "Law on Trade Unions" and judge the present regime for causing a sharp price rise and deteriorating the people's living.
					
					 It declared that it would hold a meeting to have the demands of the workers met and intensify information service and other actions with the anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising as an occasion.
					
					 It discussed and decided on the issues including the work to organize part-time workers belonging to trade unions under it.

articles.title: Demonstration Staged in Demand of Hyon In Thaek's Resignation
articles.content:
Demonstration Staged in Demand of Hyon In Thaek's Resignation
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification staged a demonstration in front of the "government" building in Seoul from April 18 to 22. Its participants demanded the resignation of Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification.
					 The demonstrators accused Hyon of putting a brake in the wheel of the process for improving the south-north relations and blocking the reunification of the country, pursuant to the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 South-north dialogue cannot happen as long as he stays in his office, they charged.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays in April Marked in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays in April Marked in Russia
						
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were opened in different parts of Russia between April 12 and 15 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 79th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were works of the President and Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits, books and photos introducing the true picture of Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies.
					
					 The mayor of Partizansk said that he was pleased with the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opening in the city on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The mayor said that the exhibition would provide Russians with an opportunity to know better about the intense loyalty of the Korean people to their leader, their ardent love for the country and rich cultural attainments. 
					
					 The vice prime minister of the government of the Jewish  Autonomous Region, the mayor of Birobizyan and other personages expressed expectation that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger with the exhibition as an occasion.
					
					 The vice chairman of the Moscow Artists Union said that the DPRK is working world-startling miracles in all fields of socialist construction, adding that they are the fruition of the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Peru
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Peruvian organizations issued bulletins on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					The Pyongyang Cultural Center in Peru carried on its bulletin on April 15 a portrait of the smiling President and a portrait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and articles titled "Korean People Remember Their Father", "The Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo," etc.
					
					 The bulletin said in an article titled "The 99th Birth Anniversary of Great President Kim Il Sung" that April 15 is an unforgettable day of historic significance.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an indomitable revolutionary, iron-willed brilliant commander and a legendary hero, the article said, adding that he made a great contribution to socialism and global independence by leading the DPRK to victory.
					
					 The glorious history of the President as a great strategist, statesman and leader serves as a model of progressive mankind struggling for the development of their nations, it noted.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Cultural and Friendship carried a portrait of the smiling President and a portrait of Kim Jong Il and an article commemorating the birth anniversary of the President on its bulletin on April 12.
					
					 The bulletin introduced in detail the revolutionary history of the President who devoted his all to the country and the revolution and global independence.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A regional organization and organizations of different countries posted special write-ups on their Internet homepages between April 10 and 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on its Internet homepage photos of the President and an article titled "Mangyongdae Is a Sacred Place for All the Revolutionaries." The article introduced in detail the members of the revolutionary family in Mangyongdae, saying that the small thatch-roofed house where the President was born is still preserved in its original state there and the patriots who dedicated their lives to the country and its people generation after generation lived in this house.
					
					 It stressed that Mangyongdae has become a sacred place of the revolution which is visited by an endless stream of not only Koreans but world progressives who follow the Juche idea and aspire after independence. 
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Cultural and Friendship posted on its Internet homepage an article saying that the President achieved the independence of the country and its prosperity under the banner of Juche and brought about epoch-making changes in the struggle to carve out the destiny of the popular masses.
					
					 The Poland-DPRK Association posted on its Internet homepage photos on the President's revolutionary activities and an article introducing his popular personality. 
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet homepage an article telling the story that Kim Il Sung visited the workers of Kangson for the building of a new country though Mangyongdae, his birthplace, was within a hailing distance in the wake of his triumphant return home after liberating the country from the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Various events were held in different countries to commemorate President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary from Apr. 10 to 14. 
					 They included seminars on his feats, Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Nepal, Ethiopia and Trinidad and Tobago and a concert and a fine art show in Guinea. 
					
					Displayed in the venues of events were works of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal feats, books, photos and art works introducing the DPRK.
					
					The chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, the chairman of the Revolutionary Students Union of Nepal and other speakers said that Kim Il Sung defeated two imperialisms, formidable enemies, in one generation, turned the DPRK into a socialist power and clearly indicated the way for the world oppressed people to follow.
					
					 They said that what the President desired during his lifetime has become a brilliant reality thanks to Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The chairman of the preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung noted that Kim Jong Il, successor to his cause, has wisely led the Korean people's struggle to build a thriving nation and protect the country's sovereignty. 
					
					 The rector of a conservatory of Guinea recalled that Kim Il Sung helped the Guinean people in their efforts to build a new society materially and morally, adding that he is the eternal sun of the Korean nation and progressive humankind as he dedicated himself to the people's happiness all his life.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Pyongyang at Night" and other Korean films.

articles.title: China Expresses Deep Concern over Gaza Situation
articles.content:
China Expresses Deep Concern over Gaza Situation 
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- China is deeply concerned about the escalating situation in the Gaza Strip, the Chinese permanent representative to the United Nations said at a Security Council open meeting on April 21. 
					 China hoped the parties concerned to exercise restraint, refrain from unilateral provocation in order to stabilize the situation as soon as possible, he said.
					
					 He noted that China hoped that the Palestine-Israel conflict would be solved through political and diplomatic ways and finally a sovereign and independent state of Palestine would be built. 
					
					 He stressed that China was opposed to settlement activities of Israel on the occupied Palestinian territory.

articles.title: China Issues White Paper on Foreign Aid
articles.content:
China Issues White Paper on Foreign Aid
 Beijing, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Information Office of the State Council issued a white paper on foreign aid on April 21.
					 China's foreign aid began in 1950 and one of the basic features of China's foreign aid policy is that it has been helping recipient countries build up their self-development capacity, the paper said.
					
					 It added that China will never use foreign aid as a means to interfere in recipient countries' internal affairs.

articles.title: Russia Rejects Georgia-NATO Statement
articles.content:
Russia Rejects Georgia-NATO Statement 
 Moscow, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Russian Foreign Ministry in a recent commentary rejected the Georgia-NATO Committee statement. 
					 The commentary said that the Georgia-NATO Committee statement contained biased information about the situation in Abkhazia and Southern Osetia far from the reality there.
					
					 It said that it would be better for NATO to exercise influence on the Georgian leadership to have a constructive stand on the issues of security and stability in the Transcaucasia.

articles.title: Iran Denounces US-Israeli Middle East Plan
articles.content:
Iran Denounces US-Israeli Middle East Plan
 Tehran, April 23 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, addressing a recent meeting, strongly denounced the U.S. and Israel for their plots.
					 The United States and Israel are seeking to subjugate the Middle East and encourage rivalries among Muslim countries, he noted.
					
					 He said the "vigilance, unity and faith" of the Muslim nations would make all conspiracies fail.

articles.title: Lebanon Condemns Israel for Its Moves to Expand Settlements
articles.content:
Lebanon Condemns Israel for Its Moves to Expand Settlements
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Lebanese permanent representative to the United Nations, speaking at an open debate of the UN Security Council on Thursday, strongly condemned Israel for its moves to expand Jewish settlements.
					 The deliberate choice of Israel to continue expanding settlements undermined the Middle East peace process, he charged.
					
					 He called on the UN Security Council to "compel Israel" to abide by the responsibilities under international law.

articles.title: Landslide in Indonesia
articles.content:
Landslide in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Six people were killed and four others wounded after landslide in West Java, Indonesia on Tuesday evening.
					 A rescue work is being done on the spot.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, abrió amplias posibilidades de usar las aguas geotérmicas dirigiendo en el terreno el Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					Viendo los equipos geotérmicos fabricados nuevamente en el complejo, averiguó en detalles la estructura, el principio de operación y las especificaciones de ellos.
					
					Se mostró muy satisfecho de que la clase obrera de Ryongsong haya alcanzado otro éxito orgulloso en la lucha por construir una potencia económica y mejorar la vida del pueblo al hacer en un corto tiempo y con fuerzas y tecnologías propias esos magníficos equipos sofisticados.
					
					Estos equipos ahorradores de energía están diseñados para incrementar varias veces la eficiencia de uso de energía térmica consumiendo menos electricidad que los anteriores equipos de calefacción y refrigeración, señaló y evaluó altamente los méritos de los funcionarios, obreros y técnicos que trabajaron con abnegación por fabricar esas máquinas de nuevo modelo.
					
					Al finalizar la visita de orientación sobre el complejo, impartió las instrucciones para el uso amplio de las aguas geotérmicas en el país.
					
					Si garantizamos la calefacción y la refrigeración de los edificios utilizando el agua geotérmica en el subsuelo, esto tendrá gran importancia en facilitar a los habitantes las comodidades de vida y asegurarles la civilización ahorrando al máximo las energías  y combustibles como electricidad y carbón, señaló.
					
					Explotar y usar bien ese valioso recurso del país constituyen una cuestión muy importante para promover el desarrollo rápido de economía nacional y procurar una vida feliz al pueblo, destacó.
					
					Enfatizó que para usar ampliamente el agua geotérmica y beneficiarse mucho de ella, hay que aumentar rápidamente la producción de equipos geotérmicos en este complejo y otras fábricas y empresas.
					
					Indicó que los órganos de investigación técnica y las universidades deben dinamizar la investigación para usar la geotermia, establecer el sistema de formación de personal técnico y tomar las medidas necesarias para promover activamente la explotación y el uso de agua geotérmica en el ámbito nacional.
					
					Expresó la esperanza y convicción de que los militantes del partido y los trabajadores de todos los sectores y unidades, inclusive la clase obrera de Ryongsong, registrarán una nueva innovación en la lucha por acelerar la construcción de potencia económica y elevar los niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Le acompañaron en esta ocasión Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comisión Militar Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buró Político del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del Buró Político y secretario del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del Buró Político y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Myong Su, ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, y Hyon Chol Hae, jefe de departamento del CDN.

articles.title: Periódicos conmemoran el 79º aniversario de la fundación del EPC
articles.content:
Periódicos conmemoran el 79º aniversario de la fundación del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- Los periódicos capitalinos dedicaron este lunes sendos editoriales al 79º aniversario de la fundación del Ejército Popular de Corea.
					El diario Rodong Sinmun adelantó que el EPC es la unidad nuclear en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construcción de una gran potencia próspera socialista.
					
					La historia del EPC es la de la revolución coreana y su invencible poderío garantiza el gran poderío nacional y el futuro maravilloso de la Corea de         Kim Il Sung, comienza el editorial de Rodong Sinmun y continúa:
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung es General Insigne sin par que dio inicio al Songun y exploró el camino de construcción de las autóctonas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					El EPC es orgullosas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias que dan firme continuidad a su historia y tradición de grueso de la revolución enalteciendo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La historia de lucha del EPC es la sagrada trayectoria en que él vino creando el ejemplo brillante de defensa a ultranza al líder en las décadas severas de la revolución y logró siempre victorias y milagros en el enfrentamiento antiimperialista y antiyanqui y en la construcción de una patria próspera haciendo uso de su indoblegable espíritu revolucionario y heroísmo masivo.
					
					Igualmente, el EPC viene conduciendo al frente a las filas revolucionarias en calidad de vanguardia y grueso de la revolución.
					
					El EPC pone de pleno manifiesto su poderío de destacamento nuclear en las filas de todo el partido, todo el ejército y todo el pueblo unidos monolíticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Va poniendo en práctica el proyecto del PTC de construir una gran potencia próspera y defiende fidedignamente la patria socialista del Juche.
					
					Bajo la guía del Dirigente mediante el Songun, el EPC seguirá cumpliendo magníficamente su misión asumida ante la patria y la nación en la lucha por llevar a feliz término la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construcción de una gran potencia próspera socialista.
					
					Por su parte, el periódico Minju Joson subrayó que el EPC ostenta su poderío como grueso de la revolución del Juche en la defensa del socialismo y la construcción de gran potencia próspera y añadió que esta realidad es otro éxito valioso de la orientación del Dirigente sobre la revolución mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Delegaciones civiles felicitan a los militares del EPC
articles.content:
Delegaciones civiles felicitan a los militares del EPC 
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 79 de la fundación del Ejército Popular de Corea, las delegaciones del pueblo visitaron las unidades de las fuerzas terrestres, marítimas y aéreas del Ejército Popular de Corea.
					Tuvieron lugar en estas unidades las ceremonias de entrega de los regalos enviados por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los miembros de las delegaciones civiles felicitaron a los uniformados informándoles las noticias de la retaguardia, donde se registra el gran auge para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo, y entregándoles los materiales de ayuda.
					
					Por su parte, los militares presentaron a los visitantes la orgullosa trayectoria de sus respectivas unidades y les demostraron sus aspectos dispuestos a defender a costa de la vida al líder y la patria.
					
					Los visitantes recorrieron varios puntos de las unidades, tales como la sala de educación, el dormitorio, el comedor, el almacén de alimentos subsidiarios y la Casa de los Militares.
					
					A continuación, realizaron juegos deportivos y de recreo con los militares y les mostraron funciones artísticas preparadas por sí mismos.
					
					Tras escuchar los episodios de la conducta de los soldados ejemplares en el entrenamientos combativo y político, les encomendaron en representación de todo el pueblo que coronen con méritos su vida de servicio militar como soldados del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los soldados manifestaron la convicción y voluntad de garantizar con armas la construcción de la gran potencia próspera del Juche sin olvidar esa encomienda de la patria y el pueblo y dar un golpe implacable a los agresores si éstos se atreven a desatar la guerra en la tierra patria.

articles.title: Viendo álamos en una unidad del EPC
articles.content:
Viendo álamos en una unidad del EPC
　Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il inspeccionó en mayo del 93 (2004) de la Era Juche una unidad del Ejército Popular de Corea.
					  Tras intercambiar el saludo con los comandantes de la unidad, recorrió el cuartel y apreció su buen mantenimiento diciendo que se ha acondicionado perfectamente la comandancia y se han ubicado bien los otros edificios.
					
					  Destacó que en el recinto del cuartel hay muchos árboles grandes inclusive un álamo de varias décadas de añejamiento.
					
					  Los comandantes se sintieron algo embarazosos porque los que plantaron esos árboles se habían mudado a otro lugar.
					
					  Informado de eso, el Dirigente dijo que es loable que los nuevos inquilinos hayan conservado intactos esos árboles cuando construyeron su nuevo cuartel.
					
					  Estos álamos son testigos de la historia que demuestran el noble patriotismo de los militares del EPC que se esfuerzan ingentemente por convertir el territorio patrio en un paraíso socialista, subrayó.
